name: Survival Prototype
description:
This is a personal project of mine where I attempt to build a survival game from scratch. I'm learning C# and have always wanted to build a survival game, so as of right now, I'm updating an island with new mechanics as I code them.

===================================

Features:

  • An island (currently sparse)
  • An axe (chop dead trees for logs)
  • A cabin
  • Fires
  • Cool rocks to pick-up 

Hint: press 1 to bring up a fire to place

Future plans:

Main menu

Pause menu

More mechanics

Better UI/UX (I'm a UX designer trying to code games for learning purposes).

Fixing shader issues
